thread.title: austunashing
thread.title_full: austunashing - Review of Portrait Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: francesco f
title: austunashing
text:
this hotel was absolutely amazing. it had great staff and such beautiful view. the service was great even on the top floor. the rooms were very comfortable and warm welcoming. there was absolutely no trouble parking. the desk people were so nice to me. AND A REAL SHOUTOUT TO MY BOY JERRY WHO WAS REALLY NICE TO ME
Room Tip: amazing people (jerry) See more room tips
